featured.text: She did not think that plastic stools were tall enough for her.
Jeanie called her invention the “Kiddie Stool.”
However, the plastic step-stool she had at home was unstable and cluttered up the small bathroom shared by her whole family.

other.text: What are the characteristics of Jeanie’s Kiddie Stool? (A) Permanent and foldable.
Many people found the story of the Kiddie Stool inspiring because it showed that with imagination, anyone can be an inventor.
Jeanie’s Kiddie Stool won first place in her school’s contest.
Why did Jeanie Low invent the Kiddie Stool, according to the passage?
The Kiddie Stool will swing out only when the cabinet door opens.
Which of the following statements is true about how the Kiddie Stool works? (A)
As a result, Jeanie was invited to make a number of public appearances with her Kiddie Stool, and was featured on local TV as well as in newspapers.

definition.zh_def: 凳子，通常用來坐的家具，通常沒有靠背和扶手。
definition.en_def: A seat or support for the buttocks, typically without a back or arms.
definition.example: She sat on the stool to reach the top shelf.
